did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Baptist Church of Ithaca records, 1811-2005.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, scrapbooks, pamphlets, books, minutes, tape recordings, architectural plans.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Materials from the Board of Trustees, boards of deacons and deaconesses, and church meetings; lists of members, baptisms, and funerals; records of women's and youth organizations; Sunday School materials; letters from donors to the church building fund. Tape recordings of services; plans for remodelling the church; records of the Danby Baptist Church and the First Baptist Church of Christ of Ithaca.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of the Board of Trustees, boards of deacons and deaconesses, and church meetings; lists of members, baptisms, and funerals; minutes statistics and correspondence of various church officials and boards; constitution; financial records; minutes, reports, accounts, and other records of various women's and youth organizations, including the Women's Missionary Society, Women's Union, and Women's Fellowship; Sunday School rolls and minutes; various other letters, resolutions, pamphlets, scrapbooks, photographs, hymn books, church newsletters, historical data, and letters from donors to the church building fund, 1889-91. There are also tape recordings of services conducted by Rev. Christian B. Jensen; plans for remodelling the church, Clarence A. Martin, architect, 1930-32; and records of the Danby Baptist Church and the First Baptist Church of Christ of Ithaca, 1811-38.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: First Baptist Church of Christ of Ithaca.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Box 8 (pledging/gift records) restricted until 18 July 2047; Box 10 (Pulpit Committee) restricted until 18 July 2067

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: First Baptist Church of Ithaca records, #2004. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Loose leg. fld. with material removed from volumes in orig. acc., alphabetical list of members, n.d., no Coon or Cornell entries, but a Mary J. Snow, dismissed Sept. 2, 1857, dismissed Feb. 18, 1858.

Series VII. Studies and drawings for remodelling of the First Baptist Church, Ithaca, N.Y., 1930-1932

scopecontent.p: These concern alterations to the Chancel, Organ, Vestry, Pulpit, Lectern, Sunday School Quarters, closets, bookcases, etc.
Architect - Clarence A. Martin, Ithaca, N.Y. in conjunction with George E. Merrill, The American Baptist Home Mission Society, New York, N.Y.
